*Infectra hears Airbomber on her Commlink and then follows the Radicons*


=
*Blizzard gasps as she see's the two fighting. Twister sighs and walks to B=
lizzard* Twister: He's right. It is getting out of hand. Blizzard: Huh? Twi=
ster: Now, Come on! *Twister says as she pulls on Blizzard's hand but then =
is pulled back* Twister: I SAID! LET'S.....GO! Blizzard: You don't own me. =
*Twister starts to growl* Blizzard: I like who I like. It's none of your bu=
siness! So keep out! *Twister starts pulling harder on Blizzards hand till =
Blizzard is pulled over there but punches Twister and falls over* Blizzard:=
 I didn't mean to. Are you all right? *Twister looks at Blizzard and then j=
umps on her punching her. They both exchange punchs and kicks over and over=
*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  Sent: Wednesday, July 12, 2000 3:52 AM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  My=
 daily post with all of my characters in it, read this...

  Radistor seper=
ated and the Radicons walked off, mumbling about how they never do anything=
 helpful because nobody wants them.

  "I say we leave the Maximals!" Stron=
ghold said.

  "I say we kill the Maximals!" Blender said.

  "Yeah, both o=
f you guy's plans sound good!" Arrow said.

  "Nah, they aren't worth it, l=
et's just get out of here." Stranato said.

  "Too bad for them they never =
got to see our true light." Train Wreck said.

  "But...what about Infectra=
?" Airbomber said sadly. The Radicons walked away, Airbomber sending a comm=
 message to Infectra.

  "Infectra, you may come with us if you like, we're=
 leaving this dump." Airbomber said.

  Plintissa had had enough of Artist,=
 he disappeared again and now she couldn't find him! Dracona walked away fr=
om Plintissa, walking along until she detected something on her scanner, th=
e important device she had lost earlier was near the Pred base. Dracona fli=
es off, sure that she can get it on her own. Dracona flies to the Predacon =
baseand lands, looking for the lost device.

  Plintissa searched for Artis=
t, she finally came across a tree with a hand sticking out. She shook the t=
ree and Artist fell out. He looked at Plintissa and then struck a pose. Pli=
ntissa sighed.

  Sinesis ran up to his brother.

  "Brother! This thing wi=
th you and Blizzard has gotten out of hand! I say you pick her or me, and t=
hat is that!" Sinesis said. Sinister sighed. He didn't want to do this, but=
 for the better of his brother he had to. He fired at Sinesis, blowing him =
backwards. Sinesis leaps at Sinister, knocking him down and choking him.

 =
 "Ingrate!" Sinesis yelled.

  "Idiot!" Sinister yelled back, poking Sinesi=
s in the eyes.

  "Lazy ass love struck piece of scrap!" Sinesis said, kcik=
ing Sinister in the gut. Sinister kneeled over and Sinesis did a running sc=
issor kick on him. Sinesis continued to choke Sinister.

  Deemos still hel=
d his guns at his side, as fdid Inzola. Deemos looked at BrightBlade and sm=
iled, not a nice smile, though. Inzola stood back to back with Deemos, read=
y to fight the enemies off. Suddenly,Sinesis and Sinister came up from the =
distance, fighting each other still. Sinesis and Sinister battled each othe=
r right up to BrightBlade, Deemos, and Inzola. Deemos and Inzola laughed. S=
inister and Sinesis stopped fighting and fired at Deemos and Inzola. Deemos=
 and Inzola fired abck and a war broke out between the 4!

  Gangon and Lig=
htmare are still being contained...

--------------------------------------=
----------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------
